libminer

The goal of libminer is to …

Installation

You can install the development version of libminer from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("catarinawor/libminer")

Example usage

To get a count of installed packages in each of your library locations, optionally with the total sizes, use the lib_summary() function:

library(libminer)
lib_summary()
#>                                                                  Library
#> 1                 C:/Users/worc/AppData/Local/Programs/R/R-4.4.0/library
#> 2 C:/Users/worc/AppData/Local/Temp/1/Rtmpi4UbN6/temp_libpath74383c226d87
#> 3                                       C:/Users/worc/Documents/Rlib/4.4
#>   n_packages
#> 1         61
#> 2          1
#> 3        267

In that case, don’t forget to commit and push the resulting figure files, so they display on GitHub and CRAN.
